description: The Camica overshirt offers added protection against cold drafts during your favorite autumn activities. Crafted from lightweight, two-way stretch nylon fabric, it adapts perfectly to your every move while wicking away moisture. Whether engaged in hours of hiking or relaxing by an evening campfire, this overshirt proves to be a must-have season after season. Its trendy, versatile design also allows casual everyday wear.
name: Camicia Pullover - Womens
